data.description: Create gauges using the GD library
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module uses the GD library to produce configurable gauge
    images for use on the web (for metrics, etc...).

    I put under GD since it uses the GD Library and I am not aware of
    any other modules with similar functionality.

    Christian Cloutier.

    P.s: I tried to register the namespace a while ago but received no
    answer.
